sellerCard.oneLiner: Web Developer, CV and Cover Letter Writer
sellerCard.description:
Hello, 
Iâ€™m a senior professional web developer with expertise in WordPress, WooCommerce, Shopify, and Wix CMS.

In addition to web development, I am a skilled CV and Cover letter writer.

I have completed an advanced web development course from Freelancing Outsourcing Care & Softtech IT, which equipped me with the knowledge and skills to handle all web design and development services.

My services include:
Website development,
Website redesign, revamp website and rebuild website, clone website etc.

Regards

description.content:
Greetings!

Thanks for coming to my gig

Are you looking for a web developer to make website Development, revamp, redesign or clone website according to all your requirements


I am here senior Experince website developer here to make a professional site for you!


I can create a completely new modern customized and responsive web page or Online store using any CMS like WordPress, Wix or Shopify according to your all requirements.


My services include:

  • Make a website development and design fully functional.
  • Cation of a responsive design that is mobile-friendly
  • Integration of payment gateways for your online store
  • SEO optimization for improved search engine rankings
  • Integration of social media buttons and widgets
  • Mobile User-friendly etc


Why You Should Hire Me?

  • Unlimited revisions
  • 90 days of free maintenance support
  • Full customizable Site/Store
  • Free Domain and Hosting Setup


I believe that communication is key, and I will work closely with you to ensure that your vision for your site is brought to life.


So, if you're ready to take your business to the next level with a professional and functional website, don't hesitate to place an order.


Best Regards

Jeasmin

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you make website developmnt for online store using Shopify?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yeah I can do website development for your online store using Shopify according to all your requirements

questionsAndAnswers.question: What CMS do you use to create business website ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can create your business website using any cms like WordPress, Wix or Shopify

questionsAndAnswers.question: Create your create drop shipping online store ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yeah, I can create any type dropshipping from Ali express, amazon or any platform according to your all requirements

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I Edit or Customize my website myself? ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If you create your website using wordpress, Shopify or Wix then you can easily customize or make small changes yourself without hiring any freelancer

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can You Redesign Website ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can redesign or update your any existing website to turn it into a modern and user friendly website

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you revamp website to make it more attractive ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please don't worry, I can rebuild or revamp your existing website to look it a more professional and responsive website
